cast.overview: After sparing a girl's life during a massacre, an elite Triad assassin is targeted by an onslaught of murderous gangsters.
cast.title: The Night Comes for Us

details.biography: Abimana Aryasatya is an Indonesian actor and film producer. He is best known for starring in the films Shackled (2012), The Night Comes For Us (2018), Gundala (2019), and in the highest-grossing Indonesian film of all time, Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss! Part 1 (2016).  He has received multiple awards and nominations such as Indonesian Movie Awards, Indonesian Film Festival, and Indonesian Box Office Movie Awards
details.name: Abimana Aryasatya
